thread.title: Live World Club Challenge: Sharks v Wigan
thread.title_full: Live World Club Challenge: Sharks v Wigan

title: Live World Club Challenge: Sharks v Wigan
text:
Live World Club Challenge: Cronulla Sharks clash with Wigan Warriors for silverware  18pm Source: FOX SPORTS AFTER lifting their first ever premiership trophy the Sharks are aiming to back up with another addition to the trophy cabinet as they take on Wigan on the Warriors’ home patch of DW Stadium. 
The game is due to kick off at 2am (AEDT) Monday. 
Cronulla have taken close to a full strength squad over for the UK odyssey, with Jack Bird’s likely move to fullback the notable exception due to the absence of the injured Valentine Holmes. 
With the tag of ‘best club side in the world’ up for grabs, Shane Flanagan will get the harshest test yet of his revamped premiership side after the retirement of Mick Ennis and the rugby switch of Ben Barba. 
LIVE stream Wigan Warriors v Cronulla Sharks on FOX SPORTS. Get your free 2-week FOXTEL PLAY trial and start watching in minutes. SIGN UP NOW . 
While Holmes is a lock to fill the No.1 jersey during the NRL season, Cronulla’s clash with Wigan will give Flanagan another look at some of the contenders for the hooker role vacated by Ennis, with Jayden Brailey to start and Fa’amanu Brown likely to relieve him off the bench. 
Follow all the action in our live blog below!
